title: Add Daily Utilities hub card and Daily Utilities tools page

requirements.text: Add a new Hub card titled "Daily Utilities" on the main hub page (frontend/src/pages/HubPage.tsx) that navigates to a dedicated Daily Utilities page when selected.

quotes:
Please add a card called Daily Utilities which has the following -

Countdown timer
Stopwatch
Pomodoro timer
Alarm
Time zone difference checker
Simple calendar printer
Shift / rota hours calculator

acceptanceCriteria: The Hub grid includes a card labeled "Daily Utilities".
Clicking the card navigates to the Daily Utilities page using the same onNavigate(Page) mechanism as other hub cards.
All user-facing text for the new card is in English.

requirements.text: Wire a new "daily" route into app navigation by extending the Page union and route switch in frontend/src/App.tsx, and ensure AppLayout back navigation returns to the hub as it does for other pages.

quotes:

acceptanceCriteria: App.tsx exports a Page union that includes a "daily" page id.
The main render switch in App.tsx renders the Daily Utilities page when currentPage is "daily".
When on the Daily Utilities page, the header back button returns to the hub (current behavior for non-hub pages).

requirements.text: Create a new dedicated page component for "Daily Utilities" that presents the requested tools on a single page using a responsive tabbed interface consistent with existing multi-tool pages (e.g., uses frontend/src/components/WrappingTabsHeader.tsx), with clear input/output sections and consistent Clear/Copy interactions where applicable using the existing copy helper (frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts).

quotes:
Countdown timer
Stopwatch
Pomodoro timer
Alarm
Time zone difference checker
Simple calendar printer
Shift / rota hours calculator

acceptanceCriteria: A new Daily Utilities page component exists under frontend/src/pages and is rendered by App.tsx when navigating to "daily".
The page title and tool labels are in English.

The page uses tabs (with wrapping tab triggers) to expose at least these 7 tools: Countdown timer, Stopwatch, Pomodoro timer, Alarm, Time zone difference checker, Simple calendar printer, Shift / rota hours calculator.
Each tool has a clear way to reset inputs/state (e.g., a "Clear" button) where applicable.

For tools that produce a text output (e.g., time zone difference summary, calendar text output, shift hours summary), a "Copy" action uses copyToClipboard from frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts and shows the existing toast feedback.

requirements.text: Implement the Daily Utilities tool logic entirely on the frontend (no backend changes) and add shared, reusable frontend utility functions for time/timer scheduling calculations (countdowns, stopwatch formatting, pomodoro cycles, time zone offset comparisons, calendar generation, and shift/rota hour calculations) in a new or existing lib module.

quotes:
Countdown timer
Stopwatch
Pomodoro timer
Alarm
Time zone difference checker
Simple calendar printer
Shift / rota hours calculator

acceptanceCriteria: No changes are required in backend/main.mo (the backend remains unused for these tools).
Shared utility functions are created/reused from a lib module rather than embedding all calculation logic directly inside the page component.
Countdown timer: user can set a duration or target date/time and see remaining time update while running; can start/pause/reset.
Stopwatch: user can start/pause/reset and see elapsed time formatted consistently; (optional) laps if implemented must have a clear way to clear.
Pomodoro timer: user can start/pause/reset and configure at minimum work minutes and break minutes; clearly indicates current phase (work/break).
Alarm: user can set a time (and optionally a date); when it triggers, a clear on-screen indication appears and can be dismissed; includes a way to clear/disable the alarm.
Time zone difference checker: user can choose two time zones (at minimum via a curated list) and see the current offset/difference and an example time conversion; includes Clear/reset.
Simple calendar printer: user can choose month and year and generate a printable view; provides a "Print" action that uses the browser print flow.

Shift / rota hours calculator: user can enter at minimum start and end date/time (and optionally breaks) and get total hours; handles overnight shifts and shows validation errors in English for invalid inputs.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
Do not add any external APIs or services for time zones or calendars; implement locally in the frontend.
Backend must remain single-actor; no backend work is required for these frontend-only utilities.
nonGoals: Do not add Internet Identity/authentication changes.
Do not add persistence/saving of alarms or timers across sessions unless explicitly requested.
Do not integrate third-party time zone or calendar libraries/services beyond what is already in the project dependencies.
Do not change existing ad placements or AdSense script behavior.
